CE MI-A PLĂCUT:
─➤ Finalul a fost perfect pentru mine.
─➤ Gândirea personajelor mi s-a părut naturală și potrivită tot timpul.
─➤ Părțile fantasy au adus puncte în plus notei. 

➪ Personaj preferat: A 
(nu mi-a plăcut în mod deosebit pe parcursul cărții, dar ce a făcut la sfârșit îl face preferatul meu) 

CE NU MI-A PLĂCUT:
─➤ Acțiunea din carte nu a fost plictisitoare, dar nici ceva care să merite 5/5 ⭐. 

#books#booksromania#booksro#bookstagram#cărți#edituratrei#încăozi#incaozi#anotherday#anotherdaybook#davidlevithan#davidlevithanbooks

Some tastes just transport you to a certain time and place and a Colonel (lemon sorbet with vodka) takes me back to France as a teenager. 🍋
.
As for this book, I devoured it (as I do anything written by David Levithan) though it also confuses me. I am not wholly sure of the point of it. I don't object to the current crazy for writing a story written from a different narrator's point of view (I adore Midnight Sun) but this book would not work if you haven't read Every Day and, instead of adding to the narrative, it gives you a lot less insight than the original from the perspective of a more boring character. Basically, I enjoyed it but learnt nothing new and didn't need it at all. I do, however, like the way the cover text matches my nasturtium flowers. 📚
.
.
.
#BooksOfInstagram #Bookstagram #AnotherDayBook #AnotherDayDavidLevithan #DavidLevithan
#davidlevithan #everyday #everydaybook #anotherday #anotherdaybook #barnesandnoble

"Letztendlich geht es nur um dich" (Every Day 2) - David Levithan - Fischer Jugendbuch.
~~~~~~~~~~
Rhiannon kann es kaum fassen, aber war das Mädchen vor ihr wirklich vor ein paar Tagen ihr Freund, mit dem sie einen wunderschönen Tag am Strand verbracht hat? Und war es an einem anderen Tag dieser seltsame Junge auf der Party, mit dem sie getanzt hat?
Vor ihr sitzt A, ein Mensch, der jeden Tag einen anderen Körper bewohnt.
Heute ist A ein Mädchen und hat beschlossen Rhiannon die ganze Wahrheit über sich zu erzählen. 
Rhiannon braucht eine Weile um das Unglaubliche zu glauben, und dann folgt das Unerwartete, sie verliebt sich ebenfalls in A. Trotz der wechselnden Körper erkennt sie A immer wieder. Aber reicht Liebe aus um der Ungewissheit, wer A morgen sein wird, standzuhalten? 
Ist es wirklich nur das Innere, was zählt?
Wie kann man mit jemandem zusammen sein, der jeden Tag komplett anders aussieht? 
Rhiannon muss Antworten finden und sich entscheiden.
~~~~~~~~~
#letzendlichgehtesnurumdich #anotherday #anotherdaybook #letztendlichsindwirdemuniversumegal #davidlevithan #everyday2  #everydayseries #davidlevithanbooks #jugendbuchtipp

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
-
Happy Friday everyone!!! 🎉 I hope everyone had a good week! What’re your plans for this weekend? Are you gonna get any reading done?
-
A little while back I reviewed Everyday by David Levithan. Surprise! This is the companion novel to that book, told from another point of view. I really liked seeing this story told by Rhiannon’s POV, and enjoyed seeing the struggle in her head as she developed feelings for A (the teen who switches bodies everyday). This book was just as good as the original and added a new twist to the story. I still found myself wondering what was going to happen next (even though I knew) and I was surprised by some of the things Rhiannon experienced without A. I can’t wait to get my hands on the sequel to Everyday and finish the storyline of all the characters!
-
#everydaybook #anotherdaybook #davidlevithanbooks #summersover #lovetoread #bookstagram #newpov #bookreview #yanovels

Прекрасен съботен следобед с чаша кафе и книга ☕️📖⁣
⁣
Първите книги на английски език, които съм чела и съм останала възхитена са романите “Every day” и “Another day” от David Levithan. 📚⁣
⁣
Романът “Every day” установява сюжетната линия през перспективата на „А“, мистична душа, която се влюбва в момиче на име Rhiannon. 💛⁣
⁣
“Another day” включва подобна сюжетна линия, но е разказан от гледната точка на Rhiannon. 💙⁣
⁣
И двете книги бяха последвани от продължение, озаглавено “Someday”, което включва както перспективите на „А“, така и Rhiannon в различни глави, заедно с множество други перспективи. Обсъждат се въпроси като “Какво е душата?” и “Какво ни прави хора?” 🤍⁣
•
•
•
#booklover #booknerd #bookaddict #bookadventureclub #bookcommunity #bookworm #booksofinstagram #everydaybook #anotherdaybook #somedaybook #davidlevithan #photooftheday #saturdayvibes

Başka Bir Gün 3/5🌌
“Seni tekrar görecek miyim?” diye sordu.
Başımı evet dercesine salladım.
“Sana kanıtlayacağım” dedi.
“Gerçekten ne anlama geldiğini göstereceğim.”
“Neyin?”
“Aşkın.”
————————
konusuna hayran kalıp beş puan verdiğim Her gün’ün ikinci kitabı; başka bir gün ile tekrardan karşınızdayım.İlk kitabı bu kadar beğenip beş puan verip neden şimdi üç vermiş olduğumu merak ediyor olabilirsiniz,çünkü bende gerçekten bu kitaba üç vereceğimi düşünmezdim bile.Başka bir gün gerçekten yazarın bana kalırsa boşlamak adına yazmış olduğu,adı geçsin diye seriyi bir an önce tamamlamak istermiş hissiyle yazdığı bir kitap diye düşünmeden edemedim.Bu Sefer yazar ikinci kitabında Her gün farklı bir bedene bürünen baş karakterimizin sevdiği kız olan Rhiannon’un ağzından anlatmış. Fakat bu sizi tahmin edemeyeceğiniz kadar sıkıcak bir şekilde kaleme alınmış,öyle ki ilk kitapta karakterimizle Rhiannon arasındaki diyalogların tümü olduğu gibi birde kızın duygularıyla beraber aynı şekilde bu kitabında tekrar karşımıza çıkıyor.Bu beni okurken haliyle aşırı derecede rahatsız etti.Her ne kadar başlarda Rhiannon’un kişisel hayatından kesitler okusak da karakterimiz’le tanıştığı süre dahil kitabın sonuna kadar yaşadıkları her anı ilk kitaptan kopyala yapıştır şeklinde okuyoruz gibi hissettiriyor.Kızın iç sesiyle beraber duygularını katmasıyla kitabın boyut kazanacağını düşünüp şans vermiştim.Ama daha sonraları bunun da rahatsız olduğum durumun yanında hiç öneminin olmadığını görmek kitabı bitirene kadar beni Reading slump’a soktu. Genel anlamda güzel olan bir serinin bu kitapta böyle olmasını beklemezdim fakat yine de kurgusu beni okumaktan alıkoyamadı.Bence sizlerde bu seriye bir şans verebilirsiniz.

|unpaid advertising| ⠀
Another day by David Levithan🌊⠀
(DE: Letztendlich geht es nur um dich)⠀
⠀
📖⁣Another Day is the companion novel to Levithan's popular teen romance novel, Every Day. Every Day establishes the story line through the perspective of "A", a mystical soul who falls in love with a girl named Rhiannon. Another Day features a similar story line; however, it is retold through Rhiannon's perspective.⠀
⠀
⠀
📝I started this book a few days ago and expected it to just be "okay". A lot of people told me that this book is bad compared to the original one: Every day. Well, I didn’t read the original book but I liked this one. Sure, it was written in another perspective and I think that the original book is more detailed but I liked it. I loved the story and it was really easy to read. I’m really looking forward to read the original book and after that the continuation that has been published last year. There’s also a movie about this book and I would also like to watch it.

I would like to know if you have already read EVERY DAY and how that book was for you.⠀
⠀
Der deutsche Titel von Every Day ist übrigens: Letztendlich sind wir dem Universum egal⠀
⠀
I will give this book 4/5⭐️⠀

Book: Another day by David Levithan. *I didn’t finish the book and I feel like rereading Mortal Instruments. *What did you think of this book? *I personally liked the first book better.  #bookstagram #book #reading #anotherdaybook #davidlevithan

Since the release of Every Day as a movie adaptation I haven’t been able to keep a copy on the shelves. If your readers love this book as much as I did they will want more! I recommend Another Day, which is not a sequel, but a companion novel told from Rhiannon’s point of view. #libraryideas #bookstagram #bookworm #booknerd #mediaspecialist #everyday #anotherday #davidlevithan #davidlevithanbooks #emberpublishing #alfredaknopfpublishing #everydaybook #anotherdaybook

So I went to see Every Day today and I thought the narrative felt more like Another Day because the film follows Rhiannon around instead of A. The story was changed quite a bit too and I honestly didn't like it that much. It was not a great book to movie adaptation in my opinion. I'm wishing I had gone to see Black Panther instead. 😕 Oh well...has anyone else seen it? I'd love to know your thoughts. ⠀
•••⠀
In other news here's my review for Another Day by David Levithan.  As I mentioned above Another Day follows the same story as Every Day, but it's all from Rhiannon's perspective. ⠀
••⠀
The story is about, A, a person who wakes up inside a different person every day and has to live that person’s life that day. A doesn’t have a family, friends, or a home because they are never in the same place for more than 24 hrs or the same person for 24 hrs. A had made peace with this and intentionally tries to leave the lives of every person they inhabit untouched. Then one day A wakes up as Justin and falls for Justin’s girlfriend Rhiannon. All of A’s rules no longer apply because A wants to be with Rhiannon every day. So this novel follows Rhiannon’s journey towards understanding A and falling in love with A. She is put in many challenging situations as she tries to find her way to A every day and as she tries to cope with the fact that A will never be in the same body. She loves A as a person, but sometimes has difficulties seeing A despite the body A inhabits. I appreciate that these books drive home the message that what makes a person who they are is not their body or appearance but their heart and soul. ⠀
••⠀
I will say I did not enjoy this one as much as the first book. I found Rhiannon's to be too angsty at times. It was interesting to read her perspective, but I don't feel like this added anything to my enjoyment of Every Day. ⠀

I devoured these two books this week after my IRL bestie @cheesymac623 told me I needed to read Every Day. Well I am happy to report she was right. I loved it. ♥️ So naturally I picked up and binged the the sequel and pre-ordered the third book. I don't have a problem, YOU have a problem.

I gave Every Day ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️and Another Day ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️, but really it's a 3.5 for me. I'm planning on writing reviews for both of these over the weekend so keep an eye out sometime next week for the official reviews.⠀
⠀
Have you read Every Day and Another Day? If so let's chat!⠀

So because of the moral support from everyone I have decided to participate in the #25infive #readathon. (25 hours of reading over the course of 5 days) It's quite aggressive for me, but I am going to give it a shot anyways. Worst case scenario, I don't achieve 25 hours of reading, but have made time to read some books I'm excited about. •••
Anyways, this is what I plan on reading over the next 5 days, but I still reserve the right to change my mind. I'm a moody reader and may end up deviating. I'll be finishing up Another Day today and plan on starting Fire Sermon next. •••
📚 Do you have any weekend reading plans?
